name: Spooky Minigames
description:
A short and sweet game consisting of two levels. Move your character to catch falling candy or break open pumpkins to find candy inside.

OUTSIDE ASSETS USED

    All 3D models from:

        Spooktober Seasonal Pack by KayKit on itch.io - https://kaylousberg.itch.io/kaykit-spooktober

    

    Background Music:

        "In Darkness" by Of Far Different Nature

            https://fardifferent.bandcamp.com/
